content:
For @all here: @Dixie Baker has completed an initial read-through of our spec as part of Argonaut's security review. She has prepared a set of pull requests with wording updates, clarifications, and preliminary security guidance at https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/fhir-bulk-data-docs/pulls?label=Security+Review

I'd like to get conversation and questions started here, and then use a telecon session to talk through any issues that merit further discussion. Please take a look and share thoughts! I should note that I'm very pleased with how this is coming together.
They look good to me, I have some notes / questions that I added as pull request comments
Thanks for the close read (as always!) @Michele Mottini
Reviewing it now... Thanks for the heads up.
